name: Hairspray Hannah: High School From Hell
name_original: Hairspray Hannah: High School From Hell
description:
Hannah has found her school overrun by shadow Demons!

Set them ablaze with a hairspray flamethrower!

The hallways of the school are shadowed, the Lighter is necessary to clear the darkness. Don't run out of fuel! Find Hairspray Cans and Lighter Refills to keep the fires going.

Controls

[WASD] -Movement

[Left Click]- Fire the flamethrower!

[P] - Restart

[Escape] - Quit
